---
title: "karina-unit-desc-cleaning"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
unit_desc <- read_csv("data-raw/unit-desc.csv")

unit_desc
```

I'm going to remove the data fellow column, rename the unit name column to match what I need to merge on later and then export the dataframe.

```{r}
unit_desc_final <- unit_desc |> select(-"Data Fellow")

colnames(unit_desc_final)[1] = "unit"

unit_desc_final
```

```{r}
unit_desc_final |> write_rds("data-processed/karina-unit-desc.rds")
```
